docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 8-- United States diplomatic and military representatives are making an all-out drive to complete LatinAmerican military accords in conformity with the Truman plan for hemisphere defense as soon as possible.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 8-- United States diplomatic and military representatives are making an all-out drive to complete LatinAmerican military accords in conformity with the Truman plan for hemisphere defense as soon as possible.

headline.main: U.S. PRESSES DRIVE FOR LATIN ACCORDS; Pacts for Hemisphere Defense Sought by Envoys--but Many Doubts Are Found on Tour

docs.snippet: A reunion of the Moore-McCormack liners Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay took place here last week when the Argentina arrived from Le Havre and Southampton with 498 passengers. It was the first time in several years that the three sister ships had come...
docs.lead_paragraph: A reunion of the Moore-McCormack liners Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay took place here last week when the Argentina arrived from Le Havre and Southampton with 498 passengers. It was the first time in several years that the three sister ships had come together in one port.
docs.abstract: To make 1 more voyage before Sept reconversion lay-up

headline.main: EVENTS OF INTEREST IN SHIPPING WORLD; A Reunion of Three MooreMcCormack Liners Markedthe Week in This Port

docs.snippet: IT is a brave man who would try to crowd the story of Latin  America into one book. There are so many nations and breeds of men in the area which we call Latin America--twenty republics, 125,000,000 people living in an area two and one-half times...
docs.lead_paragraph: IT is a brave man who would try to crowd the story of Latin America into one book. There are so many nations and breeds of men in the area which we call Latin America--twenty republics, 125,000,000 people living in an area two and one-half times that of the United States.
docs.abstract: Crow, J A; Epic of Latin America

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 12--United States recognition of the revolutionary Government of Bolivia, which came into power on July 21 after a bloody upheaval, was announced today by Acting Secretary of State Dean Acheson. The revolution cost the lives of about...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 12--United States recognition of the revolutionary Government of Bolivia, which came into power on July 21 after a bloody upheaval, was announced today by Acting Secretary of State Dean Acheson. The revolution cost the lives of about 200 persons and injuries to about 400 more.

docs.snippet: GREENWICH, Conn., Aug. 12-- In what was reported to be its last scheduled meeting with local officials, the United Nations Headquarters Commission here today heard objections from officials of Stamford, Greenwich and North Castle on the revised...
docs.lead_paragraph: GREENWICH, Conn., Aug. 12-- In what was reported to be its last scheduled meeting with local officials, the United Nations Headquarters Commission here today heard objections from officials of Stamford, Greenwich and North Castle on the revised ten-mile site affecting their communities.

headline.main: TOWNS IN 2 STATES PROTEST U.N. SITE; Headquarters Group Discusses Greenwich Watershed Area in First Joint Meeting

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 16--President Truman sailed down the Potomac at 2:32 this afternoon on the yacht Williamsburg for the first extended vacation he had had since taking office sixteen months ago.
